mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT qlname from jjg_fbgc_qlgc_zdhpzd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT val) from jjg_fbgc_qlgc_zdhpzd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and qlname=#{zx}
SELECT * from jjg_fbgc_qlgc_zdhpzd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '左幅%' ORDER BY val,qdzh,FIELD(cd, ${result})
SELECT * from jjg_fbgc_qlgc_zdhpzd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '右幅%' ORDER BY val,qdzh,FIELD(cd, ${result})
